verbs.description: George Steinbrenner , the late owner of the New York Yankees , [V: was] known simply as " The Boss , " but President Donald Trump has called him his best friend .

George Steinbrenner , the late owner of the New York Yankees , was known simply as " The Boss , " but President Donald Trump [V: has] called him his best friend .
George Steinbrenner , the late owner of the New York Yankees , was known simply as " The Boss , " but [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: called] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: his best friend] .
